description:
In this guide, learn how to check the PHP (or PHP-FPM) version on Ubuntu and other Linux distributions from the command line.

The post How to Check PHP Version in Linux (via 4 Methods) appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Check PHP Version in Linux (via 4 Methods)

description:
Learn how to install the Proton Pass Desktop App on your favorite Linux distribution, including Ubuntu, Debian, Linux Mint, Red Hat, Fedora, and more.

The post How to Install Proton Pass Desktop App on Linux appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install Proton Pass Desktop App on Linux

description:
Learn how to install iTunes on Ubuntu using a Wine program, then how to launch iTunes on Ubuntu, including its removal steps.

The post How to Install and Use iTunes on Ubuntu appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install and Use iTunes on Ubuntu

description:
Learn how to install and use Mission Center on Ubuntu and other Linux distros to monitor running processes, services, and other hardware information.

The post Mission Center: A Linux Alternative to Windows Task Manager appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Mission Center: A Linux Alternative to Windows Task Manager

description:
Apache Pinot is a real-time distributed OLAP datastore designed to answer OLAP queries with low latency. It is often used in conjunction with Apache Kafka for real-time data ingestion and analysis. This guide will walk you through the steps required to install Apache Pinot on a Linux system. We’ll cover prerequisites, downloading and extracting the […]

The post How to Install Apache Pinot in Linux appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install Apache Pinot in Linux

description:
Magento is an open-source e-commerce platform written in PHP. In this tutorial, we will install the Magento open-source community edition. It offers all the functionality you need to set up a professional online store. We will also install Elasticsearch to search through the product catalog, Redis for the session, and file cache, and serve it […]

The post How to Install Magento eCommerce Suite on Rocky Linux 9 with Elasticsearch appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install Magento eCommerce Suite on Rocky Linux 9 with Elasticsearch
